Game.Name: Special Tag Team Pro Wrestling (Japan)
Game.plot: Tag Team Wrestling is an Action game, developed by SAS Sakata and published by Namco,which was released in Japan in 1986.Cheat: Continue:Normally, there are two people per side in the game, one in and out of the ring. Whenever the one in the ring is being hugged or otherwise kept in the air, the trapped fighter's partner can come in and rescue them. However, the traditional techniques do not work if this is happening while the fighter is also pinned to the floor.Cheat: InvincibilityBecome the champion and it goes to ERP4. When the tournament starts, touch your ally and you'll become invincible.
